channel.title: TMS on Jiaming Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in TMS on Jiaming Zhang

item.title: Robotic Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation
item.description: With our advanced robotic system, surgeons can easily and accurately deliver non-invasive stimulations to the cortical area of the brain. The system is designed to be easy to use and can be operated by a single person. The system is currently being tested in a clinical trial at the Johns Hopkins Hospital.
